career.name: Olcademy
career.title: Data Engineer (Intern)
description: Built ETL pipelines for 13K+ restaurant records, reducing data sparsity from 56% to 15%.
Rebuilt restaurant search and recommendation algorithm with AI-driven quality filters and geo-spatial ranking, improving recommendation relevance.
Led and represented a team of 6 interns, mentoring newcomers on project workflows.
Recognized as 'Rising Star Intern' by the company for outstanding performance and contributions.

career.name: Techplement
career.title: Python Developer (Intern)
description: Contributed to the communication sector, focused on developing an autonomous email sending system integrated with logging and tracking functionalities
This project aimed to streamline bulk email distribution while maintaining efficiency, security, and transparency.
